# entity

**Instance Property**

The entity that represents the configuration choices.

## Declaration

```swift
let entity: Entity
```

## Accessing values

- **configurationSpecifications**: A dictionary that associates IDs of configuration sets to IDs of configurations.

items.description: A dictionary that associates IDs of configuration sets to IDs of configurations.
